item.title: “Remembering the Stonewall Uprising – 55 Years Later” Exhibit on Display in Folsom Library
item.description: Date: Friday, June 21, 2024 5:00 PM - Sun , July 21, 2024 7:00 PM - On June 28, 1969, LGBTQ+ patrons at the Stonewall Inn in New York fought back against police harassment, helping to spawn the LGBTQIA+ rights movement. To honor this event, the LGBTQ+ Task Force is proud to present an exhibit on the history of the Stonewall Uprising on the main floor of Folsom Library, using archival sources from the Stonewall National Museum, Archives, and Library to show the Uprising’s important history.

item.title: Nominations Being Sought for RAA Teaching Award
item.description: Nominations are now being accepted for the 2024 Rensselaer Alumni Association (RAA) Teaching Award, which recognizes current members of the faculty for their outstanding teaching techniques, contributions to the campus experience, and commitment to students. Nominations are due by Wednesday, July 31.

item.title: NORDTECH Workforce Development Summit to be Held July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM - The Northeast Regional Defense Technology Hub (NORDTECH) is organizing a day-long Workforce Development for Chips and Semiconductors Summit that will be held on Rensselaer’s Troy campus. The day will feature a keynote speech, a panel discussion, presentations from leading institutions and NORDTECH partners, breakout sessions, and a poster session. Register today to save your place!

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Information Session July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. item.title: Call Issued for Projects Related to HPC-Quantum Workflow
item.description: To continue RPI’s and IBM’s collaborative HPC-Quantum integration efforts, proposals are being sought for projects with potential applications and use cases for the upcoming HPC-Quantum workflow. RPI’s Future of Computing Institute will hold a 9AM-noon workshop on July 24 in CII 3130; you may also attend via Webex. If you wish to present a project or have questions, contact Osama Raisuddin.

item.title: RPI Student Food Pantry Opening July 12
item.description: Date: Friday, July 12, 2024 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM - RPI’s Student Food Pantry has officially opened its doors to supplement all undergraduate and graduate students’ primary food sources! Located near the East Campus Athletic Village (ECAV) in the East Campus Class Community Center at 2 Edgehill Terrace, the pantry will offer non-perishable items several hours a day on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Fridays during the summer.

item.title: CCPD to Host “Using Handshake for Undergrad Research Postings” Faculty Training
item.description:
On Wednesday, July 17 from 1:00PM to 2:30PM in the CCPD conference room, the CCPD will host an interactive opportunity for faculty members to learn how to use Handshake for posting undergraduate research positions. Lunch will be provided. Space is limited, so interested faculty should submit a registration webform to sign up as soon as possible.
